description: Dispatched when damage is applied to a body part. Fires after damage calculation but before health updates and propagation. Includes entity and part metadata for message rendering.

entityId.description: Entity ID of the character receiving damage

entityName.description: Display name of the entity receiving damage (resolved from core:name component)

entityPronoun.description: Pronoun for the entity receiving damage (resolved from core:gender component)

partId.description: Entity ID of the body part receiving damage

orientation.description: Orientation of the body part if applicable (e.g., 'left', 'right', null)

amount.description: Damage amount after multipliers are applied

propagatedFrom.description: Entity ID of the source part if this damage was propagated from another body part

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the damage was applied
